name: ucpl-compress-mcp
description: Self-documenting Model Context Protocol server for code context compression with real-time token savings statistics. Reduces LLM context by 70-98% while preserving semantic meaning. No system prompt configuration needed.

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('fs').chmodSync(require('path').join(__dirname, 'scripts', 'ucpl-compress'), '755'); } catch(e) { console.warn('Could not set permissions on ucpl-compress:', e.message); }"
